outputs.output_descr: The project will build capacity in the Ministry to coordinate trade related interventions, mainstream trade and support formulation of Trade Sector Development Programme which will be the main operational arm of  the Tanzania Trade Integration Strategy. It will also lay the ground for enabling Tanzania to access Enhanced Integrated Framework resources in order to address capacity issues and supply constraints issues. The project key interventions focus on horticulture, tourism (hotel classification), livestock and fisheries and capacity for Tanzania Trade Integration Strategy Coordination Office.

project_descr: Capacity Building for Trade Development & Integration, is a project to support implementation of priotity activities of the DTIS Action matrix in Tanzania. It focuses on dvelopment of institutional framework within the government to coordinate trade rela
